title: Plaited cinnamon brioche
ingredients: ['Brioche dough', '2 eggs', '150g butter, softened', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '360g plain flour', '2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', 'Glaze', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons water', 'sugar crystals or sugar pearls']
